sentences.en: "You're standing in the way," she said. "Would you mind moving aside"
sentences.cn: .。。“你挡着道了，”她说，“麻烦你让一下。”

sentences.en: A standing committee was established to coordinate the army and navy.
sentences.cn: 成立了常务委员会以协调陆军和海军。

sentences.en: Come along, Osmond. No sense in your standing around.
sentences.cn: 快点儿，奥斯蒙德，你闲站着干什么。

sentences.en: Elizabeth had a standing invitation to stay with her.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白受到邀请，可以随时去她家住。

sentences.en: He awoke to find Charlie standing near the bed.
sentences.cn: 他醒了过来，发现查利正站在床边。

sentences.en: He noticed Rolfe standing silently over by the window.
sentences.cn: 他注意到罗尔夫一声不吭地站在窗户旁边。

sentences.en: in the personal fitness stakes he left her standing.
sentences.cn: 就个人健康方面而言，他比她好得多。

sentences.en: Mack seemed to uncoil slowly up into a standing position.
sentences.cn: 麦克慢慢直起身站了起来。

sentences.en: Men were standing around, swilling beer and occasionally leering at passing females.
sentences.cn: 男人们吊儿郎当地站着，大口大口地喝着啤酒，偶尔还对着路过的女性猥亵地笑。

sentences.en: Sammy was standing close to Ned, talking animatedly with him.
sentences.cn: 萨米紧挨着内德站着，两人谈兴正浓。

sentences.en: She was standing by a pool, about to dive in.
sentences.cn: 她站在水池旁边，正要往里跳。

sentences.en: The bus was completely full, and lots of people were standing.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车里挤满了人，许多人都站着。

sentences.en: the companies wanted to stay in good standing with the government.
sentences.cn: 那些公司想与政府保持良好的关系。

sentences.en: The man was standing in his doorway watching him.
sentences.cn: 那个男人站在门口盯着他看。

sentences.en: There has been some misunder-standing of our publishing aims.
sentences.cn: 关于我们的出版目的存在着某些误解。

sentences.en: Two men were standing by the freshly dug grave.
sentences.cn: 两名男子站在新挖的坟墓边。

sentences.en: We were standing onstage playing completely out of time.
sentences.cn: 我们站在舞台上，演奏得完全不合节拍。

sentences.en: When she walked onstage she was given a standing ovation.
sentences.cn: 当她走上台时，观众起立鼓掌欢迎。

sentences.en: You have to pay standing charges whether or not you use the service.
sentences.cn: 无论是否使用这项服务，你都必须一直付费。

words.tran_cn: （戏院中或交通工具中的）站立看客；站票观众
机架；竖立的东西；煤柱；采伐残留木
站立；坚持不变；坐落于（stand的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: (航海)（主要指船的停泊）没有时间落帆的
受某人欢迎；与某人关系好
(非正式)比…好得多；比…进步快得多
adj. 长期存在的（由来以久的）
长时间起立鼓掌；起立致敬
非运行时间；停工时间；放置时间

trans.tran_cn: 长期有效的，直立的，固定的
起立，站立，身份，地位，持续时间
trans.tran_en: someone’s rank or position in a system, organization, society etc, based on what other people think of them

trans.tran_cn: 站立；坚持不变；坐落于（stand的ing形式）
